bioconda.name: hap-ibd
bioconda.summary: Hap-ibd Detects identity-by-descent (IBD) segments and homozygosity-by-descent (HBD) segments in phased genotype data.

biotools.summary:
A Fast and Simple Method for Detecting Identity-by-Descent Segments in Large-Scale Data.

The hap-ibd program detects identity-by-descent (IBD) segments and homozygosity-by-descent (HBD) segments in phased genotype data. The hap-ibd program can analyze data sets with hundreds of thousands of samples.

bioschemas.name: hap-IBD
bioschemas.summary:
A Fast and Simple Method for Detecting Identity-by-Descent Segments in Large-Scale Data.

The hap-ibd program detects identity-by-descent (IBD) segments and homozygosity-by-descent (HBD) segments in phased genotype data. The hap-ibd program can analyze data sets with hundreds of thousands of samples.
